_instructions: This file controls all aspects of report generation.
All CLI flags and environment variables have been replaced by this config.
query: Data query parameters and date range
output: Output file settings and options

site.site_description: This survey was conducted from a second story resediental balcony in the Outer Sunset neighbourhood of San Francisco.
site.speed_limit_note: The posted speed limit at this location is 25 mph.

_field_notes.latitude: Optional: GPS latitude for map marker
_field_notes.longitude: Optional: GPS longitude for map marker
_field_notes.map_angle: Optional: Rotation angle for map display

_field_notes._note: These fields are included in the report for documentation
_field_notes.cosine_error_angle: REQUIRED: Radar mounting angle in degrees (affects velocity correction)

_field_notes.source: Data source: radar_objects, radar_data, or radar_data_transits
_field_notes.min_speed: Optional: Minimum speed filter in display units
_field_notes.histogram: Generate histogram chart: true or false

_field_notes.debug: Enable debug output: true or false
_field_notes.map: Include map in report: true or false (default: false)
_field_notes.run_id: Auto-generated unique ID for this report generation
